Topic.Title: Request for the next version of Squiffy

Posts.EditableText:
For the next version of the offline Squiffy editor, would you please add the capability to change the font size of the output pane?

It's great that you added font size to the left pane (editor), but the right pane (output) still looks very small, especially in large monitors.

Many thanks for your consideration.
